text: Mugihe Imana yavuga iti :- ewe Issa mwene Mariyamu (iii) :- jewe nzowukwiza umwanya wawe w’ukubaho, hanyuma nze ndakugarure iwanje nce ndagusukura hamwe na bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri, hanyuma nze nshireho bamwe bagukurikiye hejuru ya bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri kugeza k’umusi w’imperuka, hanyuma ingaruka yanyu izoba iwanje nce ndabacira urubanza kuvyo mwahora mutumvikana ko
